description: In this survey, we intent to determine the number of person in an household, the overall detail income and expenditure of the household. Tho scope also covers the detail information of the persons living in the household. There is a diary which is used to record the daily income and expenditure of the household.
keywords: agriculture, agriculture-census, crop, fishing, forestry, garden, livestock, poultry, trees
name: Vanuatu Household Income and Expenditure Survey 2006
